three_years_ago.details: Started small with minor case file alterations, gradually expanded to systematic transcript manipulation

six_months_ago.details: Began questioning discrepancies between trial transcripts and her personal notes

three_weeks_ago.details: Noticed his submitted transcripts differed from official court records, began keeping personal backups

one_week_ago.details: Asked Security Chief Torres to investigate potential evidence tampering, Margaret learns of investigation

day_of_murder_morning.details: Finishes gathering proof of systematic transcript tampering, schedules emergency meeting with Judge Morrison

day_of_murder_lunch.details: Intercepts David's meeting request, realizes her operation is about to be exposed

day_of_murder_2pm.details: Uses administrative override to obtain industrial solvent from maintenance supplies

day_of_murder_3pm.event: Margaret enters judge's chambers for 'routine maintenance'
day_of_murder_3pm.details: Uses legitimate maintenance access to contaminate judicial robe with industrial poison

day_of_murder_330pm.event: Judge Morrison returns from lunch recess
day_of_murder_330pm.details: Puts on contaminated robe for afternoon court session, begins experiencing symptoms

day_of_murder_342pm.details: Succumbs to industrial solvent poisoning in her private chambers

day_of_murder_355pm.event: David arrives at chambers with evidence
day_of_murder_355pm.details: Comes to deliver corruption evidence package, discovers Judge Morrison's body

day_of_murder_410pm.event: Court clerk discovers David with body
day_of_murder_410pm.details: Finds David attempting CPR on Judge Morrison, calls security and police

day_of_murder_evening.event: Margaret manipulates evidence and security logs
day_of_murder_evening.details: Uses administrative access to plant evidence on David's equipment and alter security timestamps

key_timeline_facts.david_innocence_proof: David arrived after 3:55 PM, but Judge Morrison died at 3:42 PM
key_timeline_facts.margaret_opportunity: Had legitimate maintenance access to chambers from 3:00-3:30 PM
key_timeline_facts.poison_source: Industrial solvent accessed from evidence vault at 2:00 PM
key_timeline_facts.motive_timeline: Margaret learned of investigation at 12:30 PM, same day as murder
key_timeline_facts.framing_evidence: Security manipulation occurred after 6:00 PM, hours after murder

investigation_timeline.security_investigation: January 22, 2024 - Judge Morrison requests security review
investigation_timeline.murder_day: January 29, 2024 - All events culminate in murder and frame-up
investigation_timeline.arrest: January 30, 2024 - David arrested based on planted evidence
